author: Madison Dapcevich
title: Fact Check: Video Does NOT Authentically Depict DNC Attendees Chanting 'Death To America' -- Audio Is Added
text:
Does a video shared to X genuinely show attendees at the 2024 Democratic National Convention chanting "Death to America"? No, that's not true: The video on social media has added audio from a 2020 Black Lives Matter protest in Oakland, California. An unedited video of former first lady Michelle Obama's speech, which is shown in the video on X, does not include the chanting.
The claim originated in a
video shared to X on August 21, 2024, (archived here) with a caption that read:
üö®üö®'Death to America' chant heard at DNC üö®üö®
Here is how the post appeared at the time of writing:
(Source: X screenshot taken Thu Aug 22 08:07:00 2024 UTC
Michelle Obama spoke at the Democratic National Convention on August 20, 2024, in Chicago. Lead Stories watched several unedited videos of her speech, including those posted by
CBC News (archived https://ghostarchive.org/varchive/LjPrX2H7YeA) and PBS NewsHour (archived https://ghostarchive.org/search?term=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DYgJBFBwRXvc&go=Go). No version of the actual speech included audio that matched the "Death to America" chants heard in the video on X.
The audio was taken from a video posted by
Grabien (archived https://archive.ph/lTwXX), an online news video marketplace where users can buy and sell pre-edited news clips. The video, titled " BLM Protesters in Oakland, Calif. Chant 'Death to America!'" was posted to YouTube on September 1, 2020, (archived https://ghostarchive.org/varchive/Kb9rT611WQw) by Grabien. The video description links to the https://news.grabien.com/story/blm-protesters-oakland-calif-chant-death-america (archived https://archive.ph/qb1Rm) on the Grabien website with the same title.
The
account (archived https://ghostarchive.org/archive/YAJzs) that posted the video with added audio on X included a link to a website for Dilley Meme Team, which is described on its "About" page (archived https://ghostarchive.org/archive/XMBI7) as:
You know who we are, it's why you're here. The Dilley Meme Team brings tears of joy to those we love and tears of REEEEE to those we despise. WE'RE THE TIP OF THE SPEAR, AND WE'RE TAKING IT ALL BACK!
Known as Trump's Online War Machine, our content generates millions and millions of views. Often shared by the man himself, and played at the rallies, we've been fighting fake narratives of the commies and fascists for years - BY ANY MEMES NECESSARY.
The Dilley Meme Team is headed by podcaster and self-described "master troll" Brendan Dilley. A
website for The Dilley Show podcast (archived https://web.archive.org/web/20240822202952/https://www.dilleyshow.com/dilley-meme-team) also describes the Dilley Meme Team as being:
... an extraordinary collective of creators, armed with an unrivaled sense of humor and a burning passion for engaging in the political discourse of our time. Everyday, they take on the daunting task of challenging their opponents through the power of memes, humorously dissecting political ideologies and shedding light on the absurdities that surround us.
Other Lead Stories fact checks about the 2024 Democratic National Convention can be found
https://leadstories.com/cgi-bin/mt/mt-search.fcgi?IncludeBlogs=1&search=dnc#google_vignette.

author: Musliudeen Abdul Baaq
title: Marriage binding rules (II)
text:
THE next categories of these roles are exclusive to the wife, and first among them is the need for her to surrender herself to the authority of her husband. Her allegiance is to her husband. She rarely goes to see her parents once she was given in marriage. Her loyalty to the husband is foremost. Instructions given by her husband are paramount over and above those which may come from her parents because that is the Sunnah of the Prophet (SAW). The woman must take permission duly from her husband for whatsoever she may want to involve herself in. An authentic narration from Nahnah Aisha (R.A.) subscribes to this tradition.
Second is the sacred role of a faithful watch which the woman must assume over her husband‚Äôs assets, including herself. Muhammed Ibn Saheed Ibn Saab (R.A.) narrated that the Prophet (SAW) spoke of three indications which confirm a Muslim as very fortunate in the sight of Allah (SWT). The Prophet (SAW) mentioned a dutiful wife who keeps her chastity at all times and keeps watch over her husband‚Äôs property in his absence. The Prophet (SAW) said such a wife remains abundantly favoured in the sight of Allah (SWT) and the husband, too, shall relish her goodness. Reverse shall be the case for a Muslim considered very unfortunate and ill-fated, because his wife is unfaithful and negligent about his belongings. This narration buttresses the significant role the wife needs to undertake by safeguarding her sacredness and all other belongings of her husband when he may be away from home. The husband is expected to be glowing in happiness for the gift of a virtuous and pious woman with whom he is blessed by Allah (SWT).
Close to this is the duty that bars the woman from having association or affinity with any other man. Her doors and vicinities should be out of bounds to other men who are not her relations. She should not keep company of any unidentifiable adult male. The Prophet (SAW) insisted that a woman whose husband has provided for all her material needs upon his leaving on a journey does not have much justification leaving her home. The Prophet (SAW) admonished the Ummah to hold such a woman responsible for any evil done onto her by unforseen circumstances, particularly because she has no business being outside the roof of her legitimate home. In fact, the Prophet (SAW) invoked heavily on women in the Ummah who go out of their husbands‚Äô shelter undressing themselves or being undressed by other men, even when intentions behind the act were nothing amorous. The Prophet (SAW) invoked that such women would never enjoy the good sight of Allah (SWT) [Maliyah Alhudahiyu (R.A.) narrated].
Equally, Islam mandates wives to take instructions from their husbands. These directives become golden inasmuch as they do not run foul of all that the Qur‚Äôan prescribes and are treated in the Khitaab Sunnah of the Prophet (SAW). A woman has no other principal in the whole wide world besides the man she is legitimately married to. She must practically take to his orders, albeit orders which must not contravene Allah (SWT)‚Äôs sacred injunctions in the Qur‚Äôan and tradition of the Prophet (SAW) in the Hadith. Read Surah An-Nisa, Ayat 34 (Qur‚Äôan 4:34) for more insights. Spiritual benefits abound for the wife whose affairs are guided and led by her husband‚Äôs authority.
One of the authentic Hadith holds that such a woman shall be offered a blank cheque on the Day of Qiyaohm (Day of Accountability) to choose freely from one of the eight levels of the Paradise (Jahnah) for Allah [SWT]) is well pleased with her conducts here on earth. Another benefit that comes her way is Allah (SWT)‚Äôs magnanimous acceptance of every bit of her ibaadat‚Äôlah (acts of worship) such as her eeman (faith in monotheism), sohlat (the five obligatory prayers), saawm (the yearly obligatory fasting) etc.
Ancillary matters abound with a woman taking orders and instructions unquestionably from her husband. For instance, she should not dole out a grains of food items (rice, beans, millet, corn, bread, meat, fish, even water) belonging to either her or her husband except she takes prior permission from the husband. She must be alive to and respond to her husband‚Äôs intimate desire of her, even at times when she may not be well disposed. Otherwise, she stands the wrath of Allah (SWT) till the break of a new day.
Taking the express permission of the husband for virtually all she does on a daily basis is equally important for the woman to uphold as a duty to the husband. She must always seek the permission and consent of her husband whenever she must go to attend to matters outside her home. She must carry the husband along in every major decision she may have to take. She cannot afford to take him out of the picture in any matter before or after the husband knows about such. As stringent as it were, the woman should not engage in any of the very noble acts of extra-rewarding ibaadah (religious worship to Allah[SWT] alone) which are required but voluntary if she has not obtained express permission of her husband. Examples of these include fasting in the tradition of the Prophet (SAW) on Mondays, Thursdays and 13th, 14th, 15th day of every lunar month, undertaking if umrah pilgrimage (lesser hajj), all forms of charity, get-well visitats to the sick in hospitals, withdrawal into spiritual seclution in the final days of lunar month of Ramadan (I‚Äôtikaf), as well as pilgrimage to Mecca and Medina on hajj.
Muslim women must also avoid causing their husbands any kind of harm, misfortune or calamity. The Prophet (SAW) in an authentic Hadith made it known that any evils caused deliberately by a woman onto her husband is duly noted in Jahnah (Paradise) by virgins of Paradise in the High Heaven where the husband shall eventually take an everlasting abode with these virgins who shall dispense evil invocations on such a woman inflicting unprovoked and unwarranted pains and inhuman treatment against their husband in paradise.
It is equally considered a very huge responsibility for a Muslim woman to take absolute care of the day-to-day well-being of her husband. The entire chores in the household ranging from cooking, laundry, cleaning and general hygiene in the house are within the purview of the woman. It was reported in the Hadith (authentic) that Nana Aisha (R.A.) was just too overwhelmed with her daily domestic chores that she chose to request the Prophet (SAW) to employ the service of a housemaid who would do some of the chores. However, the Prophet (SAW) discouraged her, pleading with her that it would be rewarding for her to continue to discharge those chores, and in addition she should begin suplicating to Allah (SWT) with ‚ÄòAdhkar‚Äô (selected rendition which a pious Muslim does regularly by praising and adoring Allah (SWT) in exaltation), saying ‚ÄúSubhanalah‚Äù 33 times, Alhamdulilah 33 times and ‚ÄúAllahu Akhbar 34 times.
Part of expectations from a dutiful wife is her gratitude to the husband out of genuine sense of appreciation in all forms towards great gestures extended to her by the husband, intimacy between them inclusive. The Prophet (SAW) particularly insisted on this very simple but significant role for the wife, saying that one of the reasons women are considered dominant residents of Jah-ahnam (hellfire) may be for their sheer flippancy when they should acknowledge every favour and kindness done onto them by their husbands and show appreciation to them.

author: OpIndia Staff
title: Bihar: Accused who burnt Hindu religious flag with Lord Hanuman‚Äôs image in viral video arrested weeks after absconding
text:
Recently, Bihar‚Äôs Gaya Police confirmed that they arrested an accused in connection with a viral video in which several miscreants were seen burning a Hindu religious flag . The incident took place in a village that falls under the jurisdiction of Mufassil Police Station, reportedly in the first week of May.
On 23rd May, the official handle of Gaya Police responded to an X-user who requested action in this matter and the immediate arrest of the accused.
‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§´‡§§‡•á‡§π‡§™‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ 292/24 ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞, ‡§â‡§ï‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§∞‡•ã‡§™‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ó‡§ø‡§∞‡§´‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡•§
‚Äî GAYA POLICE (‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ (‡§¨‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∞) ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ) (@GAYAPOLICEBIHAR) May 23, 2024 Responding to the post, Gaya Police replied, ‚ÄúIn this regard, Fatehpur Police Station Case No. 292/24 has been registered and the said accused has been arrested and further action is being taken at the police station level.‚Äù
According to a report in a Hindi daily, Hindustan, the Mufassil Police station registered an FIR against four accused on 6th May for burning a Hindu religious flag which had Lord Hanuman‚Äôs image on it. The FIR was registered for hurting Hindu religious sentiments.
After registering an FIR, the police carried out raids to apprehend the accused, but all of them absconded.
Bringing the case into light, an X user Vanar Sena shared the video where the miscreants were seen burning the Hindu religious flag. Sharing details about the incident and the accused, Vanar Sena wrote , ‚ÄúNeeraj Jatav, Ps: Mufassil, Gaya (Bihar) @bihar_police Sir, this Neeraj wants to create riots by burning the flag of Balaji, the idol of crores of Hindus, and making it viral on social media. @GAYAPOLICEBIHAR is requested to register a case as soon as possible and arrest this person. I am saying whatever I want to do on the call.‚Äù
The Mufassil Police took cognisance of the incident after the video went viral. Regarding the viral video, SSP Ashish Bharti stated that Mufassil police station received information that a video was going viral on social media in which some anti-social elements were seen burning the flag of a particular religion. The video was investigated conventionally and technically as soon as the information was received.
After investigation, it was found that the video was from a village under the Mufassil police station. With the help of local watchmen and public representatives, all the people seen in the video were identified, he added.
The senior Police official further stated that the houses of all the accused were raided. But all the accused were found absconding from their house. He said that considering the seriousness of this matter, the Sub-Divisional Police Officer, Wazirganj and Police Station Head, Mufassil Police Station was directed for further investigation and necessary action.

author: Nastya Bobkova
title: Microsoft Copilot per Mac: Intelligenza artificiale sul vostro dispositivo
text:
Microsoft ha rilasciato l'app Copilot per Mac, che consente agli utenti di lavorare con l'intelligenza artificiale direttamente attraverso il programma macOS.
Ecco cosa sappiamo Copilot √® l'intelligenza artificiale generativa di Microsoft basata sulle tecnologie OpenAI. Offre funzioni simili a ChatGPT: gli utenti possono ottenere risposte a domande, ricevere aiuto nella programmazione, caricare immagini per il contesto, creare immagini e testi, riassumere informazioni, condurre ricerche, eseguire comandi rapidi e molto altro ancora.
Nella versione per Mac, Copilot supporta un tema scuro, il caricamento di immagini, la generazione di contenuti e la funzione Think Deeper per un'analisi pi√π approfondita. L'applicazione non prevede acquisti in-app, ma offre sia l'accesso gratuito che un abbonamento a Copilot Pro a pagamento. Quest'ultimo costa 20 dollari al mese e consente di accedere ai modelli AI pi√π recenti.
L'attesa √® finita: finalmente possiamo uscire su macOS! Scaricate Copilot per Mac e provatemi oggi stesso.
- Microsoft Copilot (@MSFTCopilot) 27 febbraio 2025 Microsoft Copilot √® disponibile gratuitamente sul Mac App Store. Funziona su tutti i Mac con chip Apple Silicon con macOS 14 o successivo.
√à noto che Windows 11 consente di integrare l'iPhone nel menu Start per trasferire file e messaggi. Ci√≤ √® reso possibile da una nuova funzione che consente di integrare l'iPhone nel menu Start, permettendo di controllare il livello della batteria, leggere i messaggi e persino effettuare chiamate o scrivere messaggi.
Microsoft ha reso gratuita la comunicazione vocale con Copilot.
Fonte: Microsoft
Intelligenza artificiale

author: √öltimas Noticias
title: Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu y Claudia La Gatta se dedican mensajes por aniversario
text:
Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu y Claudia La Gatta han destacado como una de las parejas m√°s s√≥lidas del medio art√≠stico venezolano, y en el marco de un nuevo aniversario de bodas, los actores se dedicaron emotivos mensajes en sus redes sociales.
Como se recordar√°, el actor de series como ‚ÄòBol√≠var: una lucha admirable‚Äô y la actriz y modelo de telenovelas como ‚ÄòMi prima Ciela‚Äô celebraron su matrimonio religioso el 16 de abril de 2010.
‚Äú14 a√±os de casados, mi flaca @claudialagatta‚Ä¶. quien lo dir√≠a, jejeje. De las mejores decisiones que he tomado en mi vida‚Äù, escribi√≥ Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu en su perfil de Instagram el mi√©rcoles 17 de abril.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu (@luisgeronimoabreu)
‚ÄúGracias por estos a√±os llenos de todo‚Ä¶ No ha faltado nada, pero con ganas de m√°s. Gracias por el amor, la complicidad, el apoyo, la sociedad y otras cosas que no se pueden mencionar. jejeje. Feliz aniversario‚Äù, destac√≥ seguidamente el artista, de 51 a√±os de edad, quien comparti√≥ un reel con algunos de los momentos vividos con su esposa e hijo.
Claudia La Gatta no se qued√≥ atr√°s y tambi√©n acudi√≥ a la red social de Meta para destacar la memorable fecha. ‚ÄúHace 14 a√±os nos prometimos amarnos, respetarnos y cuidarnos‚Ä¶ aqu√≠ estamos y aqu√≠ seguimos. Esas promesas siguen hoy m√°s vigentes que nunca‚Äù, escribi√≥ la maniqu√≠.
‚Äú¬°Admir√°ndonos mutuamente, con sus altos y bajos como en toda relaci√≥n, pero como se demuestra en el video, est√°s surfeando muy bien mi Chuchu y juntos de la mano, vamos guiando a nuestro pr√≠ncipe que es el fruto de este amor inmenso! Gracias por esta maravillosa aventura y que Dios siga bendiciendo nuestra uni√≥n y cumpliendo nuestros sue√±os‚Äù, a√±adi√≥ La Gatta, que apost√≥ por el tema ‚ÄòPrometo‚Äô, del colombiano Fonseca, como marco musical del video de recuerdos que public√≥.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Claudia La Gatta (@claudialagatta)
Y agreg√≥: Te amo Chuch hermoso. Feliz aniversario #14. P.D: Ya tenemos la casa, el muchacho; sigue faltando el perro, jejeje. Y tu hijo ahora tambi√©n lo pide‚Äù.
Los mensajes de la pareja se ganaron la simpat√≠a de muchos de sus seguidores en Instagram, incluidos varios famosos.
‚ÄúLos quiero. Felicidad eterna para los dos‚Äù, les coment√≥ la cantante y actriz Mariaca Sempr√∫n, mientras el actor Luciano D‚ÄôAlessandro les escribi√≥: ‚ÄúBellos‚Äù. Yul B√ºrkle, Mar√≠a Antonieta Duque, Elba Escobar, Nohely Arteaga, Rafael Romero, Carlos Mata, Coquito y Amanda Guti√©rrez fueron otras de las figuras que celebraron la solidez de la pareja.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu (@luisgeronimoabreu)
‚ÄúFue sin duda alguna la boda m√°s espectacular que pude ver por televisi√≥n, grabaron casi toda la noche, c√≥mo olvidar. Los amo, felicidades. Dios me los bendiga‚Äù; ‚ÄúFelicidades familia. A por 60 m√°s, se les quiere‚Äù; ‚ÄúFeliz Aniversario pareja querida. Abrazos fuertes y bendiciones‚Äù; y ‚ÄúMuchas felicidades para los dos, hermano, el amor verdadero es para toda la vida‚Äù, comentaron tambi√©n los internautas.
Cabe recordar que Luis Ger√≥nimo Abreu y Claudia La Gatta tuvieron su primera conversaci√≥n durante las grabaciones de la telenovela ‚ÄòEl amor las vuelve locas‚Äô, seg√∫n cont√≥ el actor en una entrevista con el medio Intervez. En esta, √©l interpretaba a Emilio Valladares, quien en un momento intenta abusar de Cristina Caudal, el personaje de ella.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Claudia La Gatta (@claudialagatta)

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - GBTC? Nah. Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Bets Future On BITO For Explosive Growth - ARK Next Generation Internet ETF (ARCA:ARKW)
text:
Summary by Ground News ARK Investment Management, led by CEO Cathie Wood, has sold its entire remaining position in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust GBTC. Approximately $100 million from the sale was used to purchase shares in ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF BITO. BITO is the first U.S. Bitcoin futures ETF and represents a new avenue for investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin. Share menu More

author: @cronista
title: El PAPA FRANCISCO llama a asumir RIESGOS por la paz mundial: "Requiere involucrarse" - El Cronista
text:
En esta noticia La posici√≥n del papa Francisco sobre las guerras y el conflicto El mensaje del papa Francisco contra los muros en las fronteras El papa Francisco afirm√≥ este s√°bado que "interceder por la paz es algo que va mucho m√°s all√° del simple compromiso pol√≠tico , porque requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos", durante una audiencia en el Vaticano a la Asociaci√≥n de Laicos Cristianos .
En su discurso el papa Francisco destac√≥ la labor de esta asociaci√≥n de "ser pacificadores". "En un mundo ensangrentado por tantas guerras, s√© que comparto con vosotros el compromiso y la oraci√≥n por la paz ".
Papa Francisco. Fuente: Archivo.
Hierba Santa y Hierba Virgen | Dos plantas ancestrales con atribuciones curativas
T√© de ra√≠z de Diente de Le√≥n | Tiene propiedades antidiab√©ticas, antiinflamatorias y farmacol√≥gicas
La posici√≥n del papa Francisco sobre las guerras y el conflicto
Y reiter√≥ que " la guerra nunca es inevitable mientras que la paz siempre es posible ; y que esto se aplica tanto en las relaciones entre los Estados como en la vida de las familias, las comunidades y el lugar de trabajo"
"Los que saben tomar posici√≥n con claridad , pero a la vez s√≠, construir la paz. se esfuerza por tender puentes, escuchar y comprender a las diferentes partes implicadas, promoviendo el di√°logo y la reconciliaci√≥n", dijo Francisco, que agreg√≥:
 "Interceder por la paz es algo que va mucho m√°s all√° del simple compromiso pol√≠tico, porque requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos".
"En un mundo marcado por conflictos y divisiones, vuestro testimonio como pacificadores, como intercesores por la paz , es m√°s necesario y precioso que nunca", los dijo.
Sumo Pont√≠fice. Fuente: Archivo.
Francisco tambi√©n afirm√≥ que en estos momentos el mundo "necesita" democracia y que "democr√°tica es aquella sociedad en la que realmente hay un lugar para todos, en la realidad y no s√≥lo en declaraciones y en el papel".
El mensaje del papa Francisco contra los muros en las fronteras El papa Francisco inst√≥ a rechazar los muros contra los migrantes, asegur√≥ que la mentalidad contra la migraci√≥n no es compatible con los valores cristianos y pidi√≥ "proteger los derechos y la dignidad del migrante ", en su v√≠deo mensual con sus intenciones de oraci√≥n para junio publicado este martes.
"Quisiera que este mes oremos por los que huyen de su pa√≠s. Al drama que viven las personas forzadas a abandonar su tierra huyendo de guerras o de la pobreza se une muchas veces el sentimiento de desarraigo, de no saber a d√≥nde se pertenece", dijo el papa Francisco .
Otras personas est√°n leyendo esto tambi√©n

author: Newsfile
title: Former NFL standout Rob Sims and Pro Football Hall of Fame Member Calvin Johnson Jr. Launch Locker Room Insurance to Empower Agents and Elevate the Industry | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Los Angeles, California--(Newsfile Corp. - December 28, 2023) - Locker Room Insurance is a forward-thinking insurance brokerage co-founded by 2021 Pro Football Hall of Fame inductee Calvin Johnson Jr. and Rob Sims, his former NFL teammate, along with experienced business executive and licensed insurance agent Craig Freeman. Together, they're on a mission to elevate the insurance industry and reach underserved markets through Locker Room Insurance.
Johnson Jr. , known for his Hall of Fame football career with the Detroit Lions, has been deeply engaged in community service since childhood, in part because he is the grandchild of a Baptist minister. His dedication led him to establish the Calvin Johnson Jr. Foundation , which has made a difference for nearly 13 years.
"The feeling you get from serving people is contagious. It feels great knowing I'm serving my neighbors and providing for families," Johnson Jr. said.
Sims , a nine-year NFL veteran who also played with the Lions, shared a similar sentiment. "We're big on finding solutions that benefit other people. It fills us with excitement to empower those without similar opportunities, enabling them to secure their family's financial future and enhance the community."
Locker Room Insurance
To view an enhanced version of this graphic, please visit:
https://images.newsfilecorp.com/files/8798/191320_bd8138025409e9b3_001full.jpg
Freeman, a mission-driven executive known for his broad business acumen and servant leadership style, is equally excited about the program and its impact on the community.
"A quarter of the population doesn't have any type of insurance," Freeman observed. "We want to be able to help. Rob and Calvin have a lot of people they love to help in various ways, but they can't take all of them to the NFL. They might also not be able to help them with other capital-intensive ventures. With insurance, they'll help many agents change their lives and their families' futures through a low barrier entrance, low capital insurance model."
To get an in-person look at how they operate, apply for an opportunity to attend the Locker Room Insurance launch party in the Detroit area later this year, where they will hosting a NFL Playoff watch party as well as providing a business overview for prospective agents. Apply to attend here .
About Locker Room Insurance:
Locker Room Insurance is a forward-thinking insurance brokerage co-founded by 2021 Pro Football Hall of Fame inductee Calvin Johnson Jr. and Rob Sims, his NFL teammate, along with experienced business executive and licensed agent Craig Freeman. Together, they're on a mission to elevate the insurance industry and reach underserved markets through Locker Room Insurance.
